# How to setup on local
### In client folder
- npm install && npm run build 
### In server folder
- npm install && npm start

# Running with docker
sudo docker run -e AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID="ASIA5DYSEEJ4VTG6AFMJ" -e AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY="/Xey1dyZnekRUYBUgpg4qRGQeYT/n0JC97m5grO9" -e AWS_SESSION_TOKEN="" -e NEWS_API_KEY="kmpP5he0WtGBURyxdrxwilAUPbeCJtDUXc8VWIZm5Ts" --name assignment1 -p 8000:3000 -i -t n10771727/fullstack
